item.title: Jenkins is Dead - Taking the Jenkins Out of Jenkins X
item.description: The importance of Continuous Delivery (CD) has accelerated rapidly over the last several years. The recent launch of the Continuous Delivery Foundation is definitely a sign of the continuing growth and significance of CD across enterprise IT and cloud computing. Not only has Jenkins been a very important part of this growth, it is one of the initial projects of the Continuous Delivery Foundation. So why then is Jenkins dead?
